item.title: Docker and Cloud Foundry
item.description: Cloud Foundry is the open source industry standard for a Platform-as-a-Service. With the next version of the Cloud Foundry scheduler, the user is now able to run his Docker images with a full PaaS experience on the Swisscom Application Cloud. Find out how to deploy your Docker images now! “Docker! Docker! Docker!” â€“ What is it? From https://www.docker.com/what-docker: Docker allows you to package an application with all of its dependencies into a standardized unit for software development.
